data.title: “The Penguins of Madagascar: Operation DVD Premier” Review
data.meta_description: We love the movie, “Madagascar!”  With Madagascar came the hilarious and mischievous Penguins.  They’re back again in the all-new “The Penguins of Madagascar Operation: DVD …
data.text:
We love the movie, “Madagascar!” With Madagascar came the hilarious and mischievous Penguins. They’re back again in the all-new “The Penguins of Madagascar Operation: DVD Premier,” which was just released on DVD yesterday, February 9th, 2010! I love these little guys and find myself laughing at them through many parts in their new movie. My boys love watching them…over…and over…and over again! If you’re looking for something sweet to give to your sweetheart this Valentine’s Day, consider giving “The Penguins of Madagascar Operation” DVD Premier.” This is a really cute and funny show! We’re so glad to own on DVD in our home and will be watching many times to come!

This pack of Penguins is originally from DreamWorks Animation’s MADAGASCAR franchise. The DVD features never-before-seen missions, plus favorite moments from the highly rated Nickelodeon series “The Penguins of Madagascar.” The MADAGASCAR franchise has earned over $1 billion at the worldwide box office and the Penguins’ Nickelodeon show was the #1 series premiere ever for the network and was the #1 animated program in October for kids 2-11. The DVD also includes exclusive access to a brand-new, Penguins-themed online game on Nick.com, a DreamWorks Animation Video Jukebox and sneak peeks at upcoming DreamWorks animation and Nickelodeon releases.

The world debut of THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR Operation: DVD Premiere coincides with Nickelodeon’s “Operation Blowhole” tentpole event on February 15, delivering millions of impressions for the Penguins franchise, along with online advertising and promotion and an updated Nick.com/penguins microsite. Additionally, licensed merchandise based on the Penguins franchise will begin arriving on shelves in January.

THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR Operation: DVD Premiere is presented in widescreen with Dolby Digital English 5.1 Surround, English 2.0 Surround, French 5.1 Surround and Spanish 2.0 Surround and English, French and Spanish subtitles. The DVD features all-new, never-before-seen missions as well as several favorite penguin adventures. Additional features include exclusive access to Nick.com’s “The Penguins of Madagascar: The Devious Dr. Blowhole” game, as well as special sneak peeks at DreamWorks Animation & Nickelodeon releases including How To Train Your Dragon, Shrek Forever After, Po’s Kung Fu Panda Virtual World, The Madagascar Story So Far, More of The Penguins of Madagascar and Fan Boy Chum Chum and a DreamWorks Animation Video Jukebox.

DREAMWORKS ANIMATION’S THE PENGUINS OF MADAGASCAR Operation: DVD Premiere

Street date: February 9, 2010

Runtime: 120 minutes

U.S. Rating: Not Rated

Canadian Rating: G
